sentences.sentence: Tell ye the daughter of Sion, Behold, thy King cometh unto thee, meek, and sitting upon an ass, and a colt the foal of an ass.
sentences.translation: 要对锡安的居民（原文作女子）说，看哪，你的王来到你这里，是温柔的，又骑着驴，就是骑着驴驹子。

sentences.sentence: Some big pop-music hits are so cyberized the singer might as well be telling you to press 1 if you know your party's exten-sion.
sentences.translation: 一些流行歌手实在是太网络化了，就像让你拨一个分机号一样简单。

sentences.sentence: For all these reasons I believed - and I believe even more strongly today - in the unique and irreplaceable mis-sion of universities.
sentences.translation: 考虑到这些理由，我过去信仰，而今天甚至更加强烈地信仰大学独特的、无可取代的使命。
